reviews.review: Definitely a great game for the price. You can tell the devs really try, but there are huuuuuge unbalances in the game that can make half of your matches unfun. Definitely worth buying because you'll experience some games that actually get your heart going, but after a while you do get sick of running into bad game after bad game.
es un juego de solo correr a lo pendejo para no perder

I played it on xbox for 500 hours then ps4 for like 2000 - 3000 now I am playing this game help ! it is not on purpose it is a constant addiction I need help all I do is press W and win and then play killer and I get spammed for camping I cant play meta as killer but 4 ds, unbreakable, bt, and adrenaline  why do I see these perks I am not even in high mmr !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Esse é bom não é excelente e nem é péssimo. Eu recomendo.
Considerando que joguei apenas um jogo assimétrico em toda minha vida devo confessar que ele é divertido dentro de um espectro de jogar casualmente.
Acho que é um ponto bem positivo de conseguirem criar jogo que fuja das mecânicas tradicionais de FPS porém de imediato percebi defeitos que não tornam o jogo ruim mas reduzem suas qualidades.
1) Exigência de DLC em um jogo que já custa 50 reais. Achei os valores salgados
2) Grinding excessivo
3) Hitbox bugadas
4) A profundidade do jogo reside muito em conhecimento de mapas e perks , fazendo o jogo ser menos intuitivo e mais analítico (eu pessoalmente gosto de coisas mais ativas então vai de cada um)
5) Mapas horrivelmente desbalanceados e confusos , faltam pontos de referência e como não tem um mini map torna ainda mais chato .A noção espacial é uma habilidade importante no DBD e no geral não é um tipo de conhecimento muito divertido de aprender e quanto mais demorado fica , mais irritante é.
6) Pouca exploração de mecânicas para survivers . Sinto que poderiam ter feito muito mais coisas , dividir os survivers em sub classes e ofertar mais ações.
7) Killers um pouco desbalanceados ainda que no fim ainda se tenha diversão com eles.

I am playing this game since 2018 so i think my opinion is valid. The first 500h were very enjoyable and fun i personally find the first 500h the best. However after i got more experienced in the game it got boring ,but i still came back for some reason everytime and i think im not the only one who does that. It´s definitely worth trying it out and experience the first reactions to the different features of dbd (e.g. the very first chases and kills, mastering techs or a killer etc...). This game has to be played with at least one friend to be enjoyable, because its always very frustrating to see a random teammate crouching in a corner or booning a totem for the 9188 time instead of doing gens or helping teammates. I highly recommend Dead by Daylight. Even if the game can be very frustrating it has still a lot of other features that can balance that to make the game acceptable.
ein gutes spiel für freunde die zusammen ein horror spiel spieln wollen

while the community can be quite toxic and there are many frustrating bugs to come by, this is a great game. BHVR are an extremely thoughtful and creative team and aims to ease those frustrations and welcome a kind and inclusive community as much as possible. that aside, this game truly offers a great horror experience that doesn't feel forced or cheesy and it is extremely based on how you and others play - YOU create the horror experience. the number of play styles to choose from causes a stream of enjoyment for hours on end. ive heard many criticisms of how this game can also be quite repetitive and while i agree, it also completely depends on how you choose to play. this game is currently my favorite and is great for game nights and i highly recommend it, just stay safe when talking with others online and remember to be kind and a good sport.
when people arent trying to ruin your day this is a great game with a wonderful community which i plan on spending thousands of hours in
ótimo game para jgr com os amgs, vale mt a pena, mas recomendo esperar uma promoção :p

It's made by Behaviour Interactive. If you want to see ego compensation and bad decision making, You got the clown show right here. For real. Who takes a look at Hillbilly. Goes 'ah yes. Everything here is perfect. There is absolutely nothing wrong, it's balanced. everyone has fun playing and facing a Hillbilly. It is punishing when you are new. But rewarding with high skill and expertise' Only to then go, in the next paragraph after. 'so We've decided to rework everything perfect about the character and make Billy suboptimal, good luck farming slabs to make him relevant!'

That decision sums up the mentality of the company. I'm not even gonna go into the community. I think that can be fixed by adding a triggerable taunt when you spam crouch that locks you in place, and a trigger that puts your flashlight durability to 0 if you spam it. (it breaks). and then just putting 'mute chat' on by default when you start the game. as for killer. DS and BT exists.

Again. Million dollar Idea. Right infront of Behaviours face. Free of charge, They're not gonna take it.
all the survivor mains are cunts and are just no brained ass hats who think they are good at the game but really arent

El nuevo parche permite jugar nuevamente. :)
Mi reseña anterior dice el por que cambie mi crítica.

Para empezar Dead By Daylight empezó como un muy buen videojuego de survival horror en cooperativo, daba una experiencia que quitó el juego Friday 13 por los bugs, errores graves, faltas de actualización y lo más irritante, los hackers que no se han solucionado hasta ahora. 

Con este videojuego me divertí por horas sola o con amigos escapando de los killers, haciendo flash light save, etc. Cosas que lo hacian un gran juego a pesar de no tener una historia en concreto y se esta creando de a poco con los años, hacía mas intrigante tener que desbloquear objetos con retos que nos indicaban cosas de los personajes ya seas Killer o Surv y daban un motivo para seguir jugándolo. La música, los escalofríos que daba cuando venía el Killer era una experiencia aterradoramente simpática que vale la pena vivir.

Pero, ¿Por qué coloco que NO recomiendo el juego? Porque parece que siguieron los pasos de Friday 13 con la diferencia que hubieron muchas actualizaciones de gran capacidad que no hicieron muchos cambios en el juego, sino que lo emperoaban, más personajes, esto significaba más bugs, más errores y que hubieran hackers. Por mi parte desde la última actualización que hubo, no me permite abrir el juego, solo errores de conexión sin darme posibilidades de jugar nuevamente este gran juego que fue hace meses atrás. 

En el caso de que Dead By Daylight permita jugar nuevamente y elimine sus hackers, mi reseña la cambiaré de negativa a positiva porque este juego no aburrió, me decepcionó de lo que jugaba y hacía esta una gran experiencia, desechar todo eso para Pcs de mejor rendimiento y personas que ya no aprecian el juego a lo que era.
только в этой игре можно увидеть груповуху, где мана ебут 4 сурва
網絡非常之好 但不知道為什麼一直斷線
